Outcome.name: Outcome
Outcome.description: Represents information about the expected change in participants that is driven by the organization's activity.

IntendedDirection.description: Specifies the intended direction of change in the behavior, knowledge, skills, status, or level of functioning that's detailed in the outcome.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when a user last referenced this outcome.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when a user last viewed this outcome.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the outcome.

SourceName.description: The name of the source that initially defined the outcome. For example, United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (UNSDG).

Status.description: Specifies the status of the outcome.

Term.description: Specifies the term for which the outcome is defined.
